content.query:
CREATE DATABASE DBDLUofUIS6480
GO

USE DBDLUofUIS6480

IF EXISTS
    (SELECT * FROM sys.symmetric_keys)
    DROP MASTER KEY
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='<some password>'
GO

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DataLakeBronzeAll
GO

DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL WorkspaceIdentity
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL WorkspaceIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE DataLakeBronzeAll
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://sauofuis6480instdev001.dfs.core.windows.net/fsuofuis6480dldw001/Bronze'
, CREDENTIAL= [WorkspaceIdentity]
)
GO

DROP SCHEMA Bronze
GO

CREATE SCHEMA Bronze
GO

CREATE LOGIN metabase001 WITH PASSWORD = '<some password>'
GO
CREATE USER metabase001 FROM LOGIN metabase001
GO
GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::WorkspaceIdentity TO [metabase001]
GO
GRANT SELECT ON SCHEMA::Bronze TO [metabase001]
GO
DENY ADMINISTER DATABASE BULK OPERATIONS TO [metabase001]
GO

DROP VIEW Bronze.UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalActor
GO
CREATE VIEW Bronze.UofUIS6480InstructorDVDRentalActor AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'UofU/IS6480/Instructor/DVDRental/Actor/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'DataLakeBronzeAll',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
